page.title: 14MEALS I LIKE
page.content: My favourite food is mash potatoes beans and sausages.Mash potato are potato mashed then you put butter with it and mash it in.It makes lumps of potato.Beans are sort of round and coverd in tomatoe sauce and are very nice.Sausages are long and a bit round on each end.They have bits of meat in the middle skin on the outside and you fry them.My favourite dessert is pancake in syrup.Pancakes in syrup is flour and milk mixed together then put on a frying pan.Then when it is done you put it on a plate roll it up then pour the syrup over it and you put some sugar on it and it is very nice to eat.
